Articles.Content:
We are all in trouble you guys...... Sorry if this has already been shared here I just ran into it on Yahoo and had to post it.

[Humorously doctored political photo snipped by moderator]

Edited December 2, 2017 by Snark
Sorry, folks, but no politics allowed.
North Korea has summoned a kraken!

8 minutes ago, ARS said:

North Korea has summoned a kraken!

It's super effective!

or however that meme is supposed to go...
The head poking out of the top of the light is a nice touch.
Looks as if that nuclear deterrence policy to stop themselves from getting invaded by the US is working out...

Sorry, all, but gotta lock this one.  'Fraid it's the same ol' same ol', politics need to stay out of the forum, no matter how funny and/or KSP-relevant they may be.

I know this was meant in jest, but the "no politics" rule is basically anything political at all, including humor.  It's a broad rule, and it's broad for a reason, based on past experience.  Please be careful about this kind of thing, okay?

Plenty of other places on the internet to post funny political stuff, for anyone so inclined.
